1/8 questionsstring> Score 0/8 What technology is used to make telephone calls over the internet possible Bluetooth Ethernet NFC VoIp VoIp
Which computer language is the best windely used c c++ java php java
Which of the following is an step important the paperless concept? Doxing Debugging Downloading Digitizing Digitizing
Anmdroid is- an operating system A web browser A web server None of the above an operating system
Under which of the following Android is licensed? OSS Sourceforge Apache/MIT None of the above Apache/MIT
Which of the following convert java byte code into Dalvik byte code? Dalvik converter Dex compiler Mobile interpretive compoiler(MIC) None of the above Dex compiler
Which of the following is the first mobile phone released that ran the Android OS? HTC Hero Google Phone T-Mobile G1 None of the above T-Mobile G1
APK stands for- Android Phone Kit Android Page Kit Android Package Kit None of the above Android Package Kit
